document_name: Capacity Development for Energy Efficiency and Security project document

outputs.output_descr:
Over the next two years, the UNDP CO aims to continue support to the energy sector in Jamaica through supporting the implementation of the National Energy Policy, the National Energy Action Plan and the five Energy Sub-Policies.  Energy conservation and efficiency should be of benefit to all in the society, but especially to the most vulnerable and marginalized, and should also result in reducing Jamaica's carbon footprint towards green development as agreed under international conventions.  The strategy will support the Government of Jamaica through the Ministry of Energy and Mining (MEM) in the following areas:
 (1) Capacity Development in the Public Sector 
(2)  Technical Assistance for Small Scale Renewable Energy   
(3) Establishment of a Public Private Dialogue Forum

project_descr: Capacity Development for Energy Efficiency and Security in Jamaica
project_title: Capacity Development for Energy Efficiency and Security
